content: Add stock item validation when ItemId is in patch request
Add return GRV quantity limits validation when QuantityGRV is modified
Update audit timestamp (ValuesUpdatedAt) in PATCH method - Implemented ApplyWhenPatched with clean syntax
Implement ApplyAfterPatch method for related entity updates
Fix QuantityFulfilled validation to check against stored QuantityGRV value
Fix DbContext extraction for ExecuteAfterPatch functionality
Create property dependency validation for grouped properties
Build validation error collection system to return multiple validation errors to consumer
